# UITextField.BorderStyle.none

**Case**

The text field does not display a border.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Constants

- **UITextField.BorderStyle.line**: Displays a thin rectangle around the text field.
- **UITextField.BorderStyle.bezel**: Displays a bezel-style border for the text field. This style is typically used for standard data-entry fields.
- **UITextField.BorderStyle.roundedRect**: Displays a rounded-style border for the text field.
